org.webcurator.core.targets
Interface TargetManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
TargetManagerImpl
public interface TargetManager

The manager for accessing Target and Target Group data.

Author:
bbeaumont

Method Detail

getAllowMultiplePrimarySeeds

boolean getAllowMultiplePrimarySeeds()
Allow a target to have multiple primary seeds. Configure on the TargetManager bean in wct_core.xml

Returns:
false will allow only one primary seed per target.

                        java.lang.String memberOf,

                        boolean nondisplayonly)

Parameters:

pageSize - the page size of the results to return

memberOf - the group the group belongs to
